document.full_text: a fresh batch of corporate results pushed u.s. stocks to their best levels since june 2008 on tuesday, renewing optimism that profit growth will remain resilient enough to keep equities on the rise.
document.title: strong earnings push s&p through key level
lines_and_colors: a fresh batch of corporate results pushed u.s. stocks to their best levels since june 2008 on tuesday, renewing optimism that profit growth will remain resilient enough to keep equities on the rise.
